subject: Re: Jason Profits "Cross Talk"
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Here's the so called "Crossover Talk".  It's actually a piece of free software that some charlatan decided to cash in on.  It's evpmaker with an allophone file created by Stefan Bion.  I guess i just saved some people $50 or whatever he's selling it for.  Also, for those who have questions about audio editing software there is more people on Ebay selling "Audacity" for like $20 and that's also free on the internet.

http://www.keyportparanormal.com/evpsoftware.html

-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "john54542" <jfrick45@...> wrote:
>
> I am now wondering what people know about Jason Profits Cross Talk. This is something that is being sold on Ebay as a "ghost hunting tool". Supposedly it is better than Frank's box or the hack box. Has anyone got this or know anything about it?
>
